Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22871 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22871 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.18.8-7, affected by CVE-2025-22871
